content.raw:
The latest Jenkins test results don't show any unexpected failures: http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-simbody-simbody_pkg-precise-amd64/50/testReport/

The cmake, pkgconfig, and gzlog tests are failing, but I believe that is a configuration issue with Jenkins. Also the SpawnDrop tests are failing for simbody because Jenkins is not using [sdformat pull request 57](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-request/57/adjust-default-simbody-parameters).
content.html:
The latest Jenkins test results don't show any unexpected failures: http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-simbody-simbody_pkg-precise-amd64/50/testReport/

The cmake, pkgconfig, and gzlog tests are failing, but I believe that is a configuration issue with Jenkins. Also the SpawnDrop tests are failing for simbody because Jenkins is not using sdformat pull request 57.
